opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on the appellant.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Susquehanna Estates v. Walker, Appellant.
Argued May 25, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
John 8. Manos, with him DePaul & Manos, for appellant.
Edward Friedman, with him Dechert, Price é Rhoads, for appellee.
May 4, 1973:
